definition: dagger-axe/abbr. for 戈瑞[ge1 rui4]/(Tw) abbr. for 戈雷[ge1 lei2]
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
so much so that/to the extent that/even

sentences.english: No suspected cancer cells or cancer cells were found.
sentences.chinese: 宫颈刮片检查两组均未查见可疑癌细胞或癌细胞。

sentences.english: When you share a page, you can designate users as viewers or editors.
sentences.chinese: 在共享页面时，您可以将用户指定为查看者或编辑者。

sentences.english: Use old newspaper to line your kitty litter box or your kitchen garbage can.
sentences.chinese: 用旧报纸垫你的猫沙盒或厨房垃圾桶。

sentences.english: Seahorses like to live in shallow waters amongst the seaweed and eelgrass.
sentences.chinese: 海马喜欢住在海藻或鳗草丛中的浅海。

sentences.english: A blindly ending branch of the alimentary canal or other organ.
sentences.chinese: 消化道或其他器官分支的盲端。

sentences.english: The branch or bud that is grafted is called the scion.
sentences.chinese: 嫁接上去的枝或芽被称为接穗。

sentences.english: Permissions will be controlled by a business manager or IT administrator.
sentences.chinese: 权限将由业务经理或IT管理员控制。

sentences.english: When a young man reached 18 or 20 years old, the capping ceremony would be held.
sentences.chinese: 一个年轻的男人十八岁或二十岁时，要举行冠礼。

sentences.english: Unplug the jack carefully examined, D-type socket pin bends whether or Broken Needle?
sentences.chinese: 拔下插口仔细检查，D型插口中是否有弯针或断针？

sentences.english: Iron corrodes unless it is greased or kept clean.
sentences.chinese: 如果不涂油或保持清洁铁便会腐蚀。

sentences.english: Trace hooks can be applied at the entry or exit of any function.
sentences.chinese: 跟踪钩子可以应用于任何函数的入口或出口。

sentences.english: Do not pressurize or expose to open flame or heat.
sentences.chinese: 不要给空容器加压，不要放在明火或热源附近。

sentences.english: You can get the norwalk virus from hand to mouth activity or from contaminated food.
sentences.chinese: 你可以得到手诺瓦克病毒污染的食物或活动口。

sentences.english: Avoid hard-coding blank spaces or tabs at the end of a line of sample code.
sentences.chinese: 要避免在示例代码行的结尾用硬编码空格或制表符。

sentences.english: Finally they were confirmed by DSA or MRI.
sentences.chinese: 后经DSA或MRI确诊为颈动脉海绵窦瘘。

sentences.english: The peeled eggs are completely natural and provide customers with convenience and ease of use.
sentences.chinese: 白煮采用提桶或真空包装，给用户提供方便和快捷。

definition: and/moreover/yet/for the time being/to be about to/both (... and...)
namely/that is/i.e./prompt/at once/at present/even if/prompted (by the occasion)/to approach/to come into contact/to assume (office)/to draw near
all are OK/both are OK/all can/both can/also can
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
